info:
error ping      : 1

close RFID      : 3

name: if (  flow.onAlerte )
Clock Toolbar
format:
<script id="titleScript" type="text/javascript">

$(function() {
    if($('.md-toolbar-tools').length != 0){
        loadClock();
    }else setTimeout(loadClock, 500)
});

function loadClock(){
    $('#clock').remove();
    var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
    
    var div = $('<div/>');
    var p = $('<p/ id="clock">');
    
    div.append(p);
    div[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px auto';
    toolbar.append(div);

    function displayTitle(lh) {
        p.text(lh); 
    }
    
    function upTime() {
        var d = new Date();
        p.text(d.toLocaleString());
    }

    if(document.clockInterval){ 
            clearInterval(document.clockInterval);
            document.clockInterval = null;
    }
        
    document.clockInterval = setInterval(upTime,1000);
}

</script>

scrollbar
format:
<style>
    ::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width:10px; /* la taille de la scrollbar*/
    }
    
    ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    padding: 2px 0;
    background-color: rgb(0,0,0); /* couleur de fond de la scrollbar */
    }
    
    
    ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background-color: rgb(75,121,48); /* Couleur de la scrollbar */
    
    }

</style>

name: INSERT INTO log
template: INSERT INTO log (info) VALUES ('msg.error [ message: {{error.message}} , type-node: {{error.source.type}}, name-node: {{error.source.name}} ]; msg.payload [ {{payload}} ] msg.topic [ {{topic}} ]');
